page.title: 08Out of School Activities
page.content: There is a recreation park that I ride up to on my bike. At the recreation park there is a slide, a round-a-bout, a see-saw and some swings. There is a football field, tennis courts and a cricket square. I ride my bike or I go round the farm and help daddy feed the cows or put the bales in the barn. Sometimes I put the hay in the manger, then I feed the bull. I go fishing in the river. We always use maggots and we make our own ground bait from bread, elderberries and water. I have a lO ft. rod and I use lOlbs. line. I have a tackle box. In it are 7 floats, 3 lots of weights, 2 disgorgers, 2 swimfeeders and 2 fishing books. The biggest fish I have caught is a roach. I also catch trout, pike, tench, perch, eels, bream and barbel.
